summary: Email correspondence between an Assistant United States Attorney and an FBI Special Supervisory Agent regarding the finalization and approval of an affidavit for a premises search warrant in New Hampshire. The email includes an attachment of the affidavit and coordinates timing for submission to a judge.

persons.name: Amanda N. Young
persons.context: Appears as a recipient (Cc) in an email chain discussing the approval and execution of a search warrant affidavit.

events.title: Coordination for New Hampshire Search Warrant Execution
events.description: Email correspondence finalizing the affidavit for a premises search warrant in New Hampshire, with plans to swear the warrant at 5:30 a.m.

keyFacts: An affidavit in support of a premises search warrant for a location in New Hampshire was being finalized.
The warrant package required approval from the FBI (including FBIHQ and Boston) and the Southern District of New York (SDNY) before submission to a judge.
The planned execution (swearing) of the warrant was scheduled for 5:30 a.m.
The correspondence indicates ongoing investigative activity related to the Epstein case in July 2020.
